charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a) and (d) BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody BOP for 185 mos; credit for time served while in federal custody for this case; Ct recommendation to BOP: Terminal Island, CA; 5 yrs super rel w/special cond for drug aftercare treatment; dft shall participate in an outpatient program approve d by Prob Off for treatment for drug &;/or alcohol abuse which will incl testing; dft shall provide Prob Off access to any req financial information; dft shall not incur new credit charges or open addl lines of credit w/out approval of Prob Off unless dft is in compliance w/payment sched; dft shall have no contact w/known gang members; $200 total SA; $64,933 total restitution to National City Bank, Euclid, OH, all concurrent w/case #1:02cr153.
